leave_cv_contact: Leave your CV with us and we can contact you for future opportunities
vision_text: To be recognized by our clients and professionals around the world as a strong leader who is trustworthy and efficient in the search and selection of international talents.
mission_text: To provide the best work opportunities for professionals worldwide and guarantee our high-quality solutions generate added value in the clients organizations.
values_text: Leadership, trust and efficiency are considered key elements aiming at the success of our company. The use of competency management tools as an essential instrument in our recruiting and selection processes allows a suitable filter that matches the distinct competences needed in the market. This enables us to ensure successful short, medium and long term results. This human talent management philosophy is integrated in our organizational culture, showing commitment to our clients and a firm conviction in our work.
aboutus_text: We are a group of multi disciplined professionals aimed at offering the best service of selection and recruitment of international talent that your organization needs. We generate a network to link experts around the world with work opportunities offered in our country, inviting you to be the protagonists of a challenge in an environment totally new in prestigious Chilean companies.
applied_sucessfully: Thank you for applying. We will contact you in 5 working days.
